StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Value
StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

TaxesOther.label: Taxes, Other
TaxesOther.description: Amount of tax expense classified as other.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityOtherChanges.label: Temporary Equity, Other Changes
TemporaryEquityOtherChanges.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in temporary equity from changes classified as other.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.label: Value Added Tax Receivable, Current
ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.label: Variable Interest Entity, Qualitative or Quantitative Information, Ownership Percentage
VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.description: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

DerivativeInstrumentsLossReclassifiedFro.label: Derivative Instruments, Loss Reclassified from Accumulated OCI into Income, Effective Portion
DerivativeInstrumentsLossReclassifiedFro.description: The effective portion of loss reclassified from accumulated other comprehensive income into income on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Period Increase (Decrease)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

AccountsPayableOtherCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Other
AccountsPayableOtherCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligations incurred and payable classified as other.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

OtherLoansPayableLongTerm.label: Other Loans Payable, Long-term, Noncurrent
OtherLoansPayableLongTerm.description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansRece.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansRece.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and collection of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Amount
RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation.description: Amount of transaction price allocated to performance obligation that has not been recognized as revenue.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

DebtLongtermAndShorttermCombinedAmount.label: Debt, Long-term and Short-term, Combined Amount
DebtLongtermAndShorttermCombinedAmount.description: Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EscrowDeposit.label: Escrow Deposit
EscrowDeposit.description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermLoansFromBank.label: Loans Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
LongTermLoansFromBank.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, excluding current portion.

PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsR.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsR.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment.
